name: OCKTaskViewDelegate
desc: A protocol that handles events related to a task-displayable object.

items.name: func didSelectTaskView(UIView & OCKTaskDisplayable, eventIndexPath: IndexPath)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate a task view has been selected.

items.name: func taskView(UIView & OCKTaskDisplayable, didCompleteEvent: Bool, at: IndexPath, sender: Any?)
items.desc: Sets a specific event for a task view controller, and creates an outcome value if the task is complete.

items.name: func taskView(UIView & OCKTaskDisplayable, didCreateOutcomeValueAt: Int, eventIndexPath: IndexPath, sender: Any?)
items.desc: Adds an outcome value to the array of outcomes for an event.

items.name: func taskView(UIView & OCKTaskDisplayable, didSelectOutcomeValueAt: Int, eventIndexPath: IndexPath, sender: Any?)
items.desc: Returns an alert controller with localized text, that confirms deleting an outcome.
